summary.text: Backend-leaning Full-Stack / Platform Engineer with strong systems and tooling focus. 2+ years building high-throughput, cloud-native microservices and developer platforms on AWS. Skilled in Go, TypeScript/Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, Docker/Kubernetes, CI/CD. Designed and scaled pipelines handling 75k req/min, cut P95 latency 95%, automated ticket workflows reducing manual ops 95%. Passionate about low-latency data paths, distributed architectures, and making engineers faster.

categories.title: Languages
categories.items: Go, TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, Python, SQL, Bash

categories.items: Node.js, Express, Fastify, NestJS, gRPC, REST, GraphQL

positions.title: Software Development Engineer - I
achievements: Rolled out a new ticketing workflow improving delayed-order handling; cut cancellations 80% and boosted CSAT.
Integrated internal maps with Google APIs; reduced third-party costs 25%.
Automated ~1M ticket sync via Python, reducing manual ops 95%.

positions.title: Software Development Intern
achievements: Migrated 200+ JS components to TypeScript + Redux; decreased build errors 40%, improved release velocity 30%.
Built Go streaming SDK piping multi-GB ZIPs to S3; halved memory use and cut transfer time 65%.
Designed GPS ingestion service (≈50k msgs/s) with live WebSocket dashboards; improved ETA accuracy 12%.
Refactored RPC/gRPC layer with goroutines and batching; slashed P95 latency 95% at 2k TPS.

experience.title: Backend Developer Intern
achievements: Scaled Strapi-based ERM to ~1k RPS via caching and query tuning; throughput up 80%.
Containerized services on AWS EC2/Docker; cut CI/CD time 75%, infra spend 63%.
Restructured React components; reduced re-renders 40%, kept FID < 50ms.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer Intern
achievements: Architected Next.js backend for UP Commercial Tax; sustained 75k req/min with JWT + WAF.
Optimized MSSQL with indices & procs; cut query latency 95%, CPU 90%.
Automated discrepancy PDFs via PDFMake & Mammoth; removed 60% manual effort.

projects.description: AI exam proctoring (TensorFlow, MediaPipe, WebRTC); reduced false positives 30%.
